title: A woman's Brief But Spectacular take on what it takes to be a professional fighter
description: Kailia Attry is a boxer based in Los Angeles who has always seen sports as a means for connection and growth, whether that was bonding with her older brother or working to improve the visibility of women athletes. She gives her Brief But Spectacular take on what it takes to be a professional fighter. PBS NewsHour is supported by - https://www.pbs.org/newshour/about/funders
